questions:
What is the photo about?
A) A castle and Nature
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In the mountains
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A busy street scene
D) The castle is on a mountain slope

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A beach
B) A castle
C) A forest
D) A lake

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A person
C) A castle
D) A river

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A sandy beach
B) A grassy field
C) A busy road
D) A body of water

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A city skyline
B) Mountains and clouds
C) The ocean
D) A desert

What type of building is depicted in the photo?
A) A modern skyscraper
B) A traditional hut
C) A historical castle
D) A wooden cabin

What is the weather like in the photo?
A) Sunny and clear
B) Rainy and cloudy
C) Snowy and cold
D) Partly cloudy

What is the relationship between the castle and the surrounding landscape?
A) The castle is on a flat plain
B) The castle is on a mountain slope
C) The castle is on an island
D) The castle is in the middle of a city

What is the architectural style of the castle?
A) Modern
B) Gothic
C) Baroque
D) Renaissance

What colors dominate the photo?
A) Blue and yellow
B) Green and white
C) Red and orange
D) Black and grey

How is the sky depicted in the photo?
A) Clear blue
B) Overcast
C) Partly cloudy
D) Stormy

What is the terrain like around the castle?
A) Flat and sandy
B) Rocky and mountainous
C) Urban and developed
D) Wet and marshy

What is the main attraction in the photo?
A) A river
B) A castle
C) A forest
D) A mountain

A) It is brightly colored
B) It is illuminated by lights

D) It is surrounded by water

What is the landscape around the castle like?
A) Urban
B) Agricultural
C) Forested
D) Desert

What kind of clouds are in the sky?
A) No clouds
B) Light and wispy clouds
C) Thick and fluffy clouds
D) Dark and stormy clouds

What is the texture of the foreground in the photo?
A) Smooth and sandy
B) Rough and rocky
C) Soft and grassy
D) Wet and muddy

How does the lighting in the photo appear?
A) Bright and harsh
B) Soft and diffused
C) Dark and moody
D) Flashy and artificial

What is the relationship between the castle and the trees?
A) The castle is surrounded by trees
B) The castle is above the tree line
C) The castle is below the tree line
D) The castle is in a treeless area

What is the primary focus of the photo?
A) The natural landscape and architectural details of the castle
B) The architectural details of the castle
C) The people around the castle
D) The wildlife in the area

What is the mood of the photo?
A) Exciting and energetic
B) Peaceful and serene
C) Dark and ominous
D) Busy and chaotic

What is the height of the castle compared to the trees?
A) Shorter than the trees
B) Taller than the trees
C) The same height as the trees
D) Not comparable

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) From above
B) From below
C) At eye level
D) From the side

B) A dirt path
C) A wooden bridge
D) No visible path

A) Red
B) White
C) Blue
D) Yellow

What kind of activity is visible in the photo?

B) Animals grazing
C) No visible activity
D) Vehicles moving

B) Grass
C) Rocks
D) Sand

What is the main element in the background?

D) A lake

A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical

B) Artificial light

B) The windows

D) The doors
